text: Group E of the 2022 FIFA World Cup will be from 23 November to 1 December 2022. The teams in the group are Spain, Costa Rica, Germany and Japan. The top two teams will go to the round of 16. ==Teams== Draw position Team Pot Confederation Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best performance FIFA Rankings FIFA Rankings Draw position Team Pot Confederation Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best performance March 2022 October 2022 E1 1 UEFA UEFA Group B winners 14 November 2021 16th 2018 Winners (2010) 7 7 E2 4 CONCACAF CONCACAF v OFC play-off winners 14 June 2022 6th 2018 Quarter-finals (2014) 31 31 E3 2 UEFA UEFA Group J winners 11 October 2021 20th 2018 Winners (1954, 1974, 1990, 2014) 12 11 E4 3 AFC AFC Third Round Group B runners-up 24 March 2022 7th 2018 Round of 16 (2002, 2010, 2018) 23 24 Notes ==Standings== In the round of 16: * The winners of Group E will play the runners-up of Group F. * The runners-up of Group E will play the winners of Group F. ==Matches== All times listed are local, AST (UTC+3). ===Germany vs Japan=== ===Spain vs Costa Rica=== ===Japan vs Costa Rica=== ===Spain vs Germany=== ===Japan vs Spain=== ===Costa Rica vs Germany=== ==Discipline== Fair play points will be used as tiebreakers if the teams are tied after the overall and head-to-head rules. These points are based on yellow and red cards given to a team. The points are: *first yellow card: minus 1 point; *indirect red card (second yellow card): minus 3 points; *direct red card: minus 4 points; *yellow card and direct red card: minus 5 points; Team Match 1 Match 1 Match 1 Match 1 Match 2 Match 2 Match 2 Match 2 Match 3 Match 3 Match 3 Match 3 Points Team Points 1 −1 3 −3 2 3 1 −6 3 3 −6 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2022 FIFA World Cup
title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Group E
